bwwExcerpt: Maybe if they'd said it a fourth time. Three times - "Beetlejuice! Beetlejuice! Beetlejuice!" - summons to life the stripe-coated, fright-wigged demon that made a superstar of Michael Keaton way back when. Could a fourth have magically conjured that extra something needed to transform Broadway's Beetlejuice into something beyond the realm of good enough?
